messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Russo-Japanese War info.
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone interested in the Russo-Japanese War should check out this website . Bob Burke In a message dated 12/12/03
messages.messageBody:
Anyone interested in the Russo-Japanese War should check out this website <
http://www.russojapanesewar.com/index.html>.

Bob Burke


In a message dated 12/12/03 7:39:47 PM, mijalo_jp@... writes:

<< Dear All,

Sorry if rather off the topic of samurai, etc, but I would be very grateful
if someone could let me know if there is a reliable source for the order of
battle for Japanese, and preferably Russian also, forces committed to
continental Asia during the war of 1904-05?

Much appreciated

Michael Lorimer >>

messages.subject: Russo-Japanese War info.
messages.msgSnippet: Dear All, Sorry if rather off the topic of samurai, etc, but I would be very grateful if someone could let me know if there is a reliable source for the order
messages.messageBody:
Dear All,
Sorry if rather off the topic of samurai, etc, but I would be very grateful if someone could let me know if there is a reliable source for the order of battle for Japanese, and preferably Russian also, forces committed to continental Asia during the war of 1904-05?
Much appreciated
Michael Lorimer
